mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subscribe WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND insurance_id=#{insuranceId} end_date >= now()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribe (user_id, insurance_id, end_date, discount_rate, discount_validate) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{insuranceId}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH), #{discountRate}, CASE WHEN #{discountRate} = 0.05 THEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) ELSE NULL END )
